markdown.markdown:
Download Resume

Anoop Singh

Education

  • Master of Science in Business Analytics, Rady School of Management, University of California, San Diego, CA | 06/2025 | GPA: 3.9/4.0
    • Relevant Courses: Unstructured Data, SQL and ETL, Collecting and Analyzing Large Data, Customer Analytics
  • Bachelor of Science in Business Economics, University of California, San Diego, CA | 06/2024 | GPA: 3.5/4.0

Experience

  • Supply Chain Data Analyst, Thermo Fisher Scientific, San Diego, CA | 03/2025 – Present
    • Developed a machine learning model in Databricks to predict supply chain risk, improving procurement efficiency and enabling proactive decision-making.
    • Built an end-to-end data pipeline integrating 5 years of supply chain data into a centralized data lake, enhancing analytics for waste reduction.
  • Project Manager, Gawad Kalinga, Philippines | 03/2024 – 06/2024
    • Implemented a solar power generator system with digital monitoring, reducing electricity costs by 80% in a rural community.
    • Led market research and feasibility analysis for producing/distributing solar lanterns to promote economic self-sufficiency.
  • Finance Intern, Bonduelle Fresh Americas, Los Angeles, CA | 06/2023 – 08/2023
    • Created a Tableau performance analysis tool to cut promotional inefficiencies, saving $15,000 annually.
    • Built a regression model for cost prediction, enabling better contract management and supply chain decisions.
  • Business Development Intern, OmniSync Inc, San Diego, CA | 06/2022 – 08/2022
    • Supported 100+ startups in securing SBIR/STTR grants through compliance and proposal support.
    • Automated engagement workflows in Python, improving client retention and outreach using database insights.

Projects

  • Food Insecurity Dashboard, Business Intelligence Systems, UCSD | 09/2024 – 12/2024
    • Built an interactive Tableau dashboard visualizing food insecurity in 84,000+ U.S. census tracts.
    • Cleaned over 1M records using SQL and Tableau Prep, delivering insights to nonprofits and advocacy groups.
  • Anime Recommender System, Web Mining & Recommender Systems, UCSD | 09/2024 – 12/2024
    • Built a personalized recommender model using 7.8M user-anime interactions; achieved RMSE of 1.56.
    • Performed EDA on 12,000+ titles to improve input quality and model accuracy.

Professional Affiliations & Leadership

  • Teaching Assistant, Customer Analytics, UCSD | 09/2024 – Present
    • Led instruction for 300+ students in segmentation techniques and R-based statistical modeling.
  • VP of Internal Development, Triton Consulting Group, UCSD | 06/2023 – 06/2024
    • Developed R-based customer segmentation and marketing strategy that increased boutique revenue by 10%.
    • Automated data governance workflows in Python, cutting cleanup time from hours to minutes.

Skills & Interests

  • Programming & Analytics: Python, SQL, R, PySpark, Spark, ETL, A/B Testing, Tableau, Power BI, Excel
  • Cloud & Big Data Tools: AWS (EMR, SageMaker), Azure, Hadoop, Snowflake, Databricks, GitHub, CRM
  • Interests: Pickleball, Snowboarding, Hiking, Weightlifting, Board Games, Baking, Machine Learning, Big Data
